Text:
Book is okay, 2.5/5

IMO she should stick to Harry Potter related novels for the overwhelming support and fan base. 

The detail in the novel seems forced, and many times useless detail - just adding words to fill instead of them having an effective meaning.
I'm still on first page, I fell asleep. :)

A lot of  you guys are downloading this because you saw J.K Rowling name on it. 

This book doesn't have any fantasy or magic elements. Its an ADULT FICTION book.

Don't have any high expectations like you had with Harry Potter books.

@you_are_deluded
That's what I was afraid of, but I'm going to give it a shot and see.  I do like her work, but HP did have too much repetition in it.

You, my dear, are **AMAZING!!**
Thank you so much for taking the time to do all that you do. if it's not too much trouble, are you able to get 
Soup of the Day (Williams-Sonoma): 365 Recipes for Every Day of the Year?
or any other Williams-Sonoma cookbook? I know it's out of your normal scope but  i'm learing to cook and really hope you can help.

Thank you so much ! I was waiting for her to do some mature reading :) I feel like she is growing with the first HP fans.. most of us are around 24-29 ! Cant wait to enjoy it. Im expecting something totally different ! :)
SEED!! :P lol just kidding! Its 1.3MB...I'll wait for a few sec to ...oh its done downloading!! :D
Thanks! Can you get any William Body, Martin Amis or Kingsely Amis please?
